title: Family identifies 2-year-old killed in suspected drive-by shooting
content:
LITTLE ROCK (KATV) — Family members have identified the 2-year-old killed in what police believe was a drive-by shooting Tuesday night.
The Little Rock Police Department is working their second homicide of the day on Tuesday, November 22.No details have been released at this time, but police say they are working a homicide near 20th and Harrison.This is developing news. We will continue to
Police say RaMaya Reed was killed while riding in a vehicle with her mother, her mother's cousin, and four other juveniles when several shots were fired into their vehicle from a passing car.
None of the witnesses were able to give a description of the suspect or the suspect's vehicle.
Investigators found several spent shell casings in the area of Charles Bussey and Harrison Street. A motive for the shooting is unknown.
